resources.string: A casual Omakase Sushi bar with reasonable prices and amazing Sushi
A Greek Restaurant in the East Village with authentic Greek cuisine and unique decor
A casual handroll Sushi bar from the people who did SugarFish
Chinese hot pot with amazing spices and unique flavors
A must visit for any trip to NYC. Escape the hustle and bustle.
A sobering site commemorating a tragic event
Who doesn\'t love this NYC architectural landmark?
Pick a warm day to go see Lady Liberty from a boat
A new speakeasy that is a coffee shop by day, and a cocktail bar at night
A great cocktail bar in the heart of Greewich Village
A trendy Italian restaurant that serves Negroni\'s on tap
A hidden speakeasy with a literal bathtub that is great for a photo op
A small concert space in the Lower East Side. One of the best in the world.
The newest concert venue in Brooklyn. Books hot indie acts.
The best techno club in the world with arguably the best soundsystem on the planet
A beautiful old theater in the Upper West Side. Books comedians as well as legacy acts.
